title: When Models Know When They Do Not Know: Calibration, Cascading, and Cleaning
raw_snippet: arXiv:2601.07965v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: When a model knows when it does not know, many possibilities emerge. title: Internal Deployment Gaps in AI Regulation
raw_snippet: arXiv:2601.08005v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Frontier AI regulations primarily focus on systems deployed to external users, where deployment is more visible and subject to outside scrutiny.
